seo.ogDescription: Reborn To Move Fearless. Science driven care for pain relief and performance.

hero.title: Reborn To Move Fearless
hero.subtitle: Recover with Clarity, move with Confidence and live without Fear.

founder.name: Dr. Swatheeshwaran
founder.bio: Dr. Swatheeshwaran, MPT Sports, is the founder of ATREUS PHYSIO and a clinician who believes in science driven, movement centred rehabilitation. His practice focuses on helping people return to an active, confident and pain free life.
founder.experience: He has worked as an Assistant Professor for three years, trained institutional and professional athletes, and delivered rehabilitation for high performance sport environments. His on field experience includes serving as physiotherapist for multiple major national, state and inter university events.

national: All India Aquatics, Beach Volleyball, Badminton, Basketball Championships (2023 to 2024)
state: TNBA Basketball Championships: Junior, Senior and State categories (2021 to 2022)

founder.approach: His approach combines clear assessment, movement analysis and evidence based loading to guide both recovery and performance. Treatment is structured to help patients return to daily function, return to sport and train with confidence. Every session focuses on clear communication so progress feels predictable, safe and understood.

philosophy.title: About Us
philosophy.intro: ATREUS PHYSIO was built from years of Clinical Experience, Teaching and On-Field Sports Practice. The focus has always been simple: help people Move Better, Recover Stronger and Feel Confident in their bodies again.

sections.title: Why ATREUS PHYSIO Was Created
sections.content: It was created to bring Science Driven Assessment, Movement Based Rehabilitation and Structured Loading into everyday physiotherapy care, removing Guesswork and Uncertainty for patients.

sections.title: Philosophy: Movement First, Fear Out
sections.content: Movement is the foundation of recovery. Reducing Fear, improving Understanding and building Confidence are central to long term progress.

sections.title: Treatment Style
sections.content: Assessment Led, Biomechanics Informed and Exercise Centred. Every plan is Personalised, Progressive and built to improve Strength, Endurance and Cardiac Capacity through structured, evidence based loading.

sections.title: Qualifications and Background
sections.content: Led by Dr. Swatheeshwaran, MPT Sports, with experience as an Assistant Professor, Sports Physiotherapist and Performance Trainer for National, State and Inter-University Athletes.

sections.title: Patient Centred Approach
sections.content: Care is designed around the Person, not just the Injury. Communication is Clear, Goals are Aligned and treatment evolves based on the Patientâ€™s Response.

sections.title: Vision and Identity of ATREUS PHYSIO
sections.content: To create a space where Science, Clarity and Movement shape rehabilitation. A clinic where people feel Supported, Guided and Capable of returning to the activities they value.
